title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen/Centerpiece (plan)", June 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 70
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower center: SOUPIERE MILIEU DE TABLE/3/PLAN; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/6. 41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Oval tureen drawn in plan, molded edge body fitted with lid surmounted by an arched handle indicated in green ink below a faceted band flanked by similarly designed scroll handles. Underdrawing in graphite of tureen in golden section.
